thread.title: Paul Pierce says he'll probably retire if Clippers win a championship

title: Paul Pierce says he'll probably retire if Clippers win a championship
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun: NBA - Today 
In his 18th season in the NBA, Paul Pierce would like to play in front of his family and friends and bring a championship to his hometown. I...
